name: @pioug/MidiConvert
description: Convert MIDI file to JSON-friendly format

scripts.build: rollup -f umd -n MidiConvert src/MidiConvert.js > build/MidiConvert.js && java -jar ./node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --compilation_level SIMPLE_OPTIMIZATIONS --language_out=ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --js build/MidiConvert.js --js_output_file build/MidiConvert.min.js
scripts.test: eslint src/*.js test/*.js && nyc ava test/*.js

author: Yotam Mann
